content: Hi all, I am trying to convert my test app from STU2 to STU3. Does someone have experience or information about what is necessary? thx regards

what was your specfic problem? I just did a quick & dirty android project to use hapi with stu3:
https://github.com/elnin0815/hapiStu3AndroidDemo

The problem with gradle can be solved this way:

//f√ºr FHIR-Integration
//STU3:
compile 'ca.uhn.hapi.fhir:hapi-fhir-android:2.5-SNAPSHOT:dstu3@jar'

But it requires multidex support then.
